reviewText: Not very well put together.  Lots of yakking and very little good footage.
Decent coverage for a year-end review.  Some good shots of gnarly terrain.  Maybe too many podium shots.  Overall a pretty good video.
Need to slow down the narration and maybe focus a bit more - it speeds by so fast. However, it's awesome to see all the races in any format. Really enjoyed this and the 2009 version that came out.
